aka: Nobody Said I Have to Love You
this_title: Nihče ni rekel, da te moram imeti rad
trans_title: Nobody Said I Have to Love You
introduction: Alexander is a career-successful man who comes to pick up his eleven-year-old son Jan to take him to music school. Jan is not waiting for his father in front of the block, but is still taking a shower, as he is dirty from football. Aleksandar is in a hurry, but Jan doesn't want to go into music school at all. Not having time and patience to talk to Jan, Alexander shakes his son and triggers an epileptic seizure of Jan.
chinese_title: Nihče ni rekel, da te moram imeti rad
